1: I pray sincerely, and my plea is heard.
2: When I call, I receive a swift, attentive response.
3: Treasure time and build enduring inner strength.
4: Maintain a strong heart and remember to eat daily.
5: I speak hope and my body grows strong.
6: I build resilience through quiet solitude and watchful reflection.
7: I keep watch from a high place with clear focus.
8: Constant opposition strengthens resilience and courage.
9: I transform sorrow into strength and compassion.
10: Compassion lifts the humbled to greater lasting strength.
11: Embrace life's brevity and cultivate enduring strength each day.
12: Enduring truth guides and inspires every generation.
13: Timely compassion brings lasting favor and renewal.
14: Cherish even the smallest parts of your community.
15: All nations and rulers honor the universal glory.
16: Strong communities reveal a shining presence.
17: Sincere prayers from the needy receive compassionate attention.
18: Written record inspires future generations to give joyful praise.
19: A higher presence attentively watches over the world.
20: Compassion frees prisoners and releases those facing death.
21: Communities publicly celebrate and proclaim divine goodness together.
22: People and nations unite in shared service and purpose.
23: Value each day and grow stronger.
24: I live out my days; timeless years span generations.
25: The world rests on firm foundations.
26: You endure and renew all things.
27: Unchanging presence endures throughout all ages
28: Steadfast service sustains generations and establishes their secure future.
